@NonNullApi @NonNullFields

Package org.springframework.scheduling.commonj

Convenience classes for scheduling based on the CommonJ WorkManager/TimerManager facility, as supported by IBM WebSphere 6.0+ and BEA WebLogic 9.0+.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DelegatingTimerListener Deprecated
    as of 5.1, in favor of EE 7's DefaultManagedTaskScheduler
    DelegatingWork Deprecated
    as of 5.1, in favor of EE 7's DefaultManagedTaskExecutor
    ScheduledTimerListener Deprecated
    as of 5.1, in favor of EE 7's DefaultManagedTaskScheduler
    TimerManagerAccessor Deprecated
    as of 5.1, in favor of EE 7's DefaultManagedTaskScheduler
    TimerManagerFactoryBean Deprecated
    as of 5.1, in favor of EE 7's DefaultManagedTaskScheduler
    TimerManagerTaskScheduler Deprecated
    as of 5.1, in favor of EE 7's DefaultManagedTaskScheduler
    WorkManagerTaskExecutor Deprecated
    as of 5.1, in favor of the EE 7/8 based DefaultManagedTaskExecutor

Package org.springframework.scheduling.commonj Description

Convenience classes for scheduling based on the CommonJ WorkManager/TimerManager facility, as supported by IBM WebSphere 6.0+ and BEA WebLogic 9.0+.
